    C

    Candle - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents a single candlestick in a financial chart.

    Constructs a Candle instance with the specified OHLC values.
    candleHistory - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Historical candlestick data derived from priceHistory.
    canTrade() - Method in class Buyer
    Checks if the buyer is allowed to make a trade.
    Capital - Variable in class Buyer
    The amount of capital the buyer has left for purchasing stocks.
    cash - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Virtual cash balance available to simulate purchases.
    cashLabel - Variable in class SimulatedTradePanel
    Label displaying the current amount of virtual cash available to the user.
    clickPoint - Variable in class ResizeListener
     
    close - Variable in class Candle
    The closing price at the end of the time period.
    CloseMarket() - Static method in class StockMarket
    Sets the market status to closed, signaling the simulation to stop.

    Creates a new Buyer with the given parameters.
    currentPrice - Variable in class Stock
    The current price of the stock.
    customTradeWindow - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Trade panel window to display and interact with trading simulation.
    CustomWindowPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    CustomWindowPanel is a Swing component that provides a borderless window with a custom title bar and support for minimize, fullscreen toggle, and close buttons.
    CustomWindowPanel(JPanel, boolean, String) - Constructor for class CustomWindowPanel
    Constructs a CustomWindowPanel with the given content and window behavior options.
